about_the_game:
DESTRUCTION IS UPON US

WORLD EATER is a bossfight game about an underpaid astronaut fighting a giant worm in space. You are a regular crystal mining employee for the company, who has tasked you with a seamingly easy endeavor. One of their worms has discovered a magical resource called space dust, which has some interesting side effects. 

Set out on a mission that is most definitely not stated in your contract and defeat the world eating worm!

Show em' how it's done. Run, fly, dodge and smack your way through this epic space bossfight against the colossal, solar system eating worm!

FEATURES

  • Enjoy the vast, beautiful space environments

  • Run, fly and dodge on interesting and ever-changing planets

  • Fight your way through several environments while the WORLD EATER tries to stop you

WHAT'S NEXT?

We are a small team of 4 developers who have been working at improving the current state of the game. We are planning on creating a lot more content with new and interesting mechanics and environments. We hope you join us in our journey in making our student project a full-fledged game!

DESTRUCTION IS UPON US

WORLD EATER is a bossfight game about an underpaid astronaut fighting a giant worm in space. You are a regular crystal mining employee for the company, who has tasked you with a seamingly easy endeavor. One of their worms has discovered a magical resource called space dust, which has some interesting side effects. 

Set out on a mission that is most definitely not stated in your contract and defeat the world eating worm!

Show em' how it's done. Run, fly, dodge and smack your way through this epic space bossfight against the colossal, solar system eating worm!

FEATURES

  • Enjoy the vast, beautiful space environments

  • Run, fly and dodge on interesting and ever-changing planets

  • Fight your way through several environments while the WORLD EATER tries to stop you

WHAT'S NEXT?

We are a small team of 4 developers who have been working at improving the current state of the game. We are planning on creating a lot more content with new and interesting mechanics and environments. We hope you join us in our journey in making our student project a full-fledged game!
